title: Sales Solutions Specialist
job_overview:
Customer Success Specialist.

    Manage client accounts and maintain strong relationships.
    Meet sales targets through new customer acquisition and upselling existing clients.
    Provide product knowledge and recommend solutions based on client needs.
    Ensure excellent customer service while addressing client issues and offering tailored fleet management solutions.

This role demands adaptability, a goal-oriented approach, and strong customer connection skills.
